meanings.definition: A colorless oily liquid compound used in the manufacture of dyes and pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent1: The aniline was essential in creating vibrant dyes for the fabrics.
meanings.sent2: Chemists often rely on aniline to develop new pharmaceutical products.
meanings.sent3: The aniline decided to dye its hair purple for a change.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity flowed like aniline, coloring her world with endless possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The scent of aniline lingered in the air, a reminder of the colorful creations it birthed.

meanings.definition: A derivative of aniline, used in the production of rubber and plastics.
meanings.sent1: The factory workers mixed the aniline derivative into the rubber mixture.
meanings.sent2: Plastic manufacturers depend on aniline derivatives for their production processes.
meanings.sent3: The aniline derivative had a rubbery personality, always bouncing back from setbacks.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like an aniline derivative, molding into different forms to fit the situation.
meanings.sent5: The versatility of the aniline derivative made it a valuable asset in the manufacturing industry.
